description: This source file defines the NoteService class, which provides core operations such as listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes within a note management system. It interacts with a NoteRepository to perform database operations related to Note entities, and manages user-specific note data.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class handling business logic related to notes, such as listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes for specific users.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieve a list of all notes for a given user, ordered by the last update time in descending order.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Create a new note for a specified user with a given title and content, initializing timestamps and saving it to the repository.

methods.name: getOwned
methods.description: Retrieve a specific note by its UUID that is owned by the provided user, throwing an exception if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update the fields of an existing note with new title, content, and archived status, and refresh the updated timestamp.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete a specified note from the repository.
